data.expected_result: If it fails to generate an invite, it shouldn't even generate one.
data.short_description: When clicking "instant invite" from an invalid invite, it actually leads you to the invite screen and posts a blank discord.gg when you select someone.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a quick server, and send an invite to someone's DM. - Delete that server, and go back to the DM. - Then, you will see an invalid invite with "Create instant invite". Press it. - It should lead you to the invite screen. Select someone and send it. - Go to the DMs of that user you just selected.
